page.title: 18A WEEK AT POLEGATE SCHOOL
page.content:
POLEGATE C.P. SCHOOL HAS @ 190 CHILDREN IN 6 CLASSES. THERE ARE 7 TEACHERS. THIS IS A TYPICAL TIMETABLE FOR UPPER JUNIORS: {MONDAY 9.00}START.{9.15}ASSEMBLY {9.30 LIST{10.45}PLAY{11.00}P.E{11.30}FRENCH {12.00}LUNCH{1.15}READING{1.50}TOPIC{ {2.45}PLAY{3.00}GAMES{3.45}HOME. {TUESDAY 9.00}START{9.15}HYMN PRAC. {10.00}LIST{10.45}PLAY{11.00}LIS{12.00} LUNCH{1.15}READING{1.50}SCIENCE{2.45} PLAY{3.00}TOPIC{3.45}HOME. {WEDNESDAY}-similar to Monday {THURSDAY} -similar to Tuesday {FRIDAY} -we try to ensure that all the week's work has been finished.
EVERY WEEK WE HAVE @ 10 TASKS THAT WE SHOULD INDIVIDUALLY COMPLETE. AS WE FINISH EACH TASK, WE TICK IT OFF ON A LIST AND THIS IS KEPT BY THE TEACHER AS ONE OF THE RECORDS OF OUR WORK.
